channel.title: IATI Talk Events
channel.description:
This Wiki Post contains a list (in date order) of upcoming IATI related events. If you know of an event that should be listed here, then please edit the page to add it to the list!
**February 2015** [24-25th February 2015, Responsible Data for Humanitarian Response, The Hague/Leiden, Netherlands](http://www.peaceinformaticslab.org/responsible-data.html)
**April 2015** [16-17th April 2015, Global Conference on Cyber Space, The Hague, Netherlands](https://www.gccs2015.com/news/application-process-civil-society-participation-gccs2015-launched)
**May 2015** [20-22 May 2015, 13th Int'l Conference on Social Implications of Computers in Developing Countries, Negombo, Sri Lanka](http://www.ifipwg94.org/ifip-wg94-conference-2015) specifically: [Track 12: The Data Revolution in International Development](http://www.ifipwg94.org/track-12-the-data-revolution-in-international-development)
[May 2015, IATI TAG, TBC](http://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/about-the-iati-tag-2015-category/121)
[28-29 May 2015, 3rd International Open Data Conference, Ottawa, Canada](http://opendatacon.org/)
**November 2015** [5-6th November 2015, Open Development Camp, Amsterdam, NL](http://www.opendevelopmentcamp.org/)
